title: Cash in as Indiaâ€™s top two two-wheeler makers Hero and Honda battle it out this festive season
description: India's top two-wheeler makers, Hero MotoCorp and Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India, are gearing up for an intense competition during the festive season. Both companies plan to boost sales with aggressive promotional schemes. Hero aims to retail 1.5 million units, while Honda targets a 15-20% increase over last year.
